component.description: Dialog is a panel component overlaying other elements. Dialog avoids popup blockers, provides customization, resizing, modality, ajax interactions and more.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
header false java.lang.String Text of the header.
draggable false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies draggability. Default is true.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies resizability. Default is true.
modal false java.lang.Boolean false Boolean value that specifies whether the document should be shielded with a partially transparent mask to require the user to close the Panel before being able to activate any elements in the document. Default is false.
visible false java.lang.Boolean false Sets dialogs visibility. Default is false.
width false java.lang.String Width of the dialog in pixels. Default is auto.
height false java.lang.String Height of the dialog.
minWidth false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE Minimum width of a resizable dialog. Default is unl.
minHeight false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE Minimum height of a resizable dialog. Default is height of titlebar.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the dialog container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the dialog container.
showEffect false java.lang.String Effect to use when showing the dialog.
hideEffect false java.lang.String Effect to use when hiding the dialog.
position false java.lang.String Defines where the dialog should be displayed.
closable false java.lang.Boolean true Defines if close icon should be displayed or not.
onShow false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when dialog is displayed.
onHide false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when dialog is hidden.
appendToBody false java.lang.Boolean false Appends dialog as a child of document body.
showHeader false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies visibility of header content.
footer false java.lang.String Text of the footer.
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Dynamic mode allows dialog to fetch it's contents before it's shown rather than on page load which is useful to reduce initial page load times. Default is false.
minimizable false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies if dialog is minimizable or not. Default false.
maximizable false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies if dialog is maximizable or not. Default false.
